00034 #include "btkVector.h"
00035 
00036 
00037 // Local includes
00038 #include "btkSphericalCoordinates.h"
00039 
00040 
00041 namespace btk
00042 {
00043 
00044 Vector::Vector() : CartesianCoordinates()
00045 {
00046     // ----
00047 }
00048 
00049 Vector::Vector(Real x, Real y, Real z) : CartesianCoordinates(x,y,z)
00050 {
00051     // ----
00052 }
00053 
00054 bool Vector::isNull()
00055 {
00056     return (this->x() == 0) && (this->y() == 0) && (this->z() == 0);
00057 }
00058 
00059 Direction Vector::toDirection()
00060 {
00061     SphericalCoordinates s = this->toSphericalCoordinates();
00062 
00063     return Direction(s.theta(), s.phi());
00064 }
00065 
00066 Vector Vector::operator*(Real factor)
00067 {
00068     return Vector(this->x()*factor, this->y()*factor, this->z()*factor);
00069 }
00070 
00071 Vector Vector::operator*(std::vector<Real> factors)
00072 {
00073     return Vector(m_x*factors[0], m_y*factors[1], m_z*factors[2]);
00074 }
00075 
00076 Real Vector::angleWith(Vector v)
00077 {
00078     Real normThis = std::sqrt( this->x()*this->x() + this->y()*this->y() + this->z()*this->z() );
00079     Real normV    = std::sqrt( v.x()*v.x() + v.y()*v.y() + v.z()*v.z() );
00080     Real dotProd  = this->x()*v.x() + this->y()*v.y() + this->z()*v.z();
00081 
00082     return std::acos( dotProd / (normThis * normV) );
00083 }
00084 
00085 void Vector::Normalize()
00086 {
00087     Real norm = std::sqrt(m_x*m_x + m_y*m_y + m_z*m_z);
00088     m_x /= norm;
00089     m_y /= norm;
00090     m_z /= norm;
00091 }
00092 
00093 } // namespace btk
